document_data.name: Misstyre
document_data.mainbody: '''Misstyre''' was a [[drow]] [[wizard]] and merchant who lead a tribe of a hundred or so of his brethren in the western region of the [[High Forest]].
document_data.Personality: The drow's group would capture female [[elf|elves]] from the nearby area under Misstyre's leadership. To maintain a strong military presence, Misstyre would order his men to regularly waylay nearby travelers and woodsmen.
